document_data.name: Laculite
document_data.mainbody: '''Laculite''' was a precious aquamarine-colored [[crystal]] found in the waters of the [[Underdark]].
document_data.Description: Laculite crystals formed in subterranean lakes and water pools of Underdark. Even though they were considered to be cheaper than [[ruby|rubies]], [[svirfneblin]] often mined laculites.
document_data.Usages: A suspension could be extracted from laculites through [[alchemy]]. This suspension of laculite could be used to brew ''[[greater elixirs of arcane cultivation]]''.
